pluggable.author: Scott Merrill

pluggable.description: Automatically make thumbnail from the first image in a post.

help.value:
Requires Habari Media Silo
Creates a thumbnail for the first image file, taken from the Habari Media Silo, in $post->info->photology_thumb. You can also obtain the thumbnail by echoing $post->content_excerpt_out
